paper_abstract: In this paper bi-directional associative memory (BAM) neural networks with recent-history distributed delays and impulses are considered. Sufficient conditions for the existence and global exponential stability of a unique equilibrium point are established by using the fixed point theorem and differential inequality techniques. The results of this paper are new and they complement previously known results. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Global exponential stability of BAM neural networks with recent-history distributed delays and impulses
